resources.string: Put some time on your calendar to take a short walk, enjoy the sun.
Listen to a new podcast or audiobook
Listen to a podcast and explore a topic
Find a quiet space, close your eyes, and focus on your breath. Inhale slowly for four counts, hold for four, and exhale for four. Repeat for five minutes.
Drink a glass of water first thing
Before you reach for coffee or tea, drink a full glass of water. Hydrating first thing in the morning can help kickstart your metabolism.
Do a series of simple stretches to wake up your muscles. Focus on your neck, shoulders, back, and legs. This can improve flexibility and reduce tension.
